thread.title: People are understandably freaked out by this toy horse's genitalia
thread.title_full: People are understandably freaked out by this toy horse's genitalia

author: Chloe Bryan
title: People are understandably freaked out by this toy horse's genitalia
text:
2017 is already shaping up to be stressful, and to make matters worse, a toy company put weirdly detailed penises on their toy horses.
This upsetting development was brought to the internet's attention by Bob Velcoro on Wednesday when he posted photos of the toy to Twitter.
"Not sure why this toy needs this level of detail," he wrote.
SEE ALSO: Kid's festive Christmas drawing accidentally ends up very, very NSFW
Not sure why this toy needs this level of detail pic.twitter.com/WB7WKJQKcI
â€” Bob Velcoro (@atbobb) January 5, 2017
And judging by the barrage of confused reactions, no one else seems to be sure, either.
On Twitter, more than a few people complained about the genitals' size, which are apparently not quite to scale. Another person tried to set his female horse up with Velcoro's male horse. Several people just said, "ew."
We are sure all of this is what Battat, the Canadian toy company that manufactures these virile figurines, intended.
@atbobb I feel like it's not even to scale tbh fail all around
â€” Roy ðŸŒ¹ (@yavin_alliance) January 5, 2017
@atbobb Even the horse doesn't appear to understand what's going on here
â€” internet alias (@styrovor) January 5, 2017
@atbobb @Dieuwer Maybe they should meet ðŸ’• pic.twitter.com/LoWn1JjJsw
â€” Fjerd (@jordivanderoord) January 5, 2017
Even Neko Case had to weigh in on horse penis-gate.
@atbobb @SteveHorrocks And that's like a human wiener stuck on a horse? Ew!
â€” Neko Case (@NekoCase) January 5, 2017
It's worth noting that Battat has made their horses this way for at least the past several years. In 2014, Redditor Zeppelinfan81592 observed that the figurines were "much more anatomically correct" than they expected.
